name: Boeing XM-P plasma rifle
description: Boeing developed the focused plasma weaponry together with DARPA.  It heats solid hydrogen to create plasma and envelops it with polymers to reduce blooming.  While powerful, it suffers from overheating.  Powered by UPS.  This rifle is ready and waiting to fire.  Activate it to open the vents and begin cooling it down.

use_action.msg: You press a button and vents open on the plasma rifle with a hiss. You won't be able to put it down until it finishes venting.

name: Boeing XM-P plasma rifle (cooling)
description: This plasma rifle is currently venting heat with an alarming plume of steam.  Better not drop it or you could cause some damage.
revert_msg: The plasma rifle beeps as its vents close, now in standby mode.

name: Boeing XM-P plasma rifle (standby)
description: Boeing developed the focused plasma weaponry together with DARPA.  It heats solid hydrogen to create plasma and envelops it with polymers to reduce blooming.  While powerful, it suffers from overheating.  Powered by UPS.  This rifle is in standby mode, and can be activated to bring it to firing mode.

use_action.msg: You press a button and the plasma rifle warms up to fire.
